articles.description: Glitch in production means initial volumes will be ‘lower than originally anticipated’
articles.content: Pharmaceutical company AstraZeneca has informed EU countries there will be a delay on deliveries of its Covid-19 vaccine, according to European officials, a blow to vaccination efforts amid mounting … [+1768 chars]
